remarks: Cardinal multiplication distributes over cardinal addition.  Theorem 6I(3) of [Enderton] p. 142.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Sep-2004.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Apr-2015.)
statement: xpcdaen $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ B e. W /\ C e. X ) -> ( A X. ( B +c C ) ) ~~ ( ( A X. B ) +c ( A X. C ) ) ) $.
